Title: The Keys to a Productive One-on-One Meeting with Daniel Ramsey and Brendan Wovchko
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks with Executive Vice President of EntreLeadership Daniel Ramsey. They role-play how to have a productive one-on-one meeting. Later, George sits down with Brendan Wovchko, the chief technology officer at Ramsey Solutions. He shares how to make your one-on-one meetings effective and the best ways to build relationships with your team members.


You’ll learn:

•      How to have an effective one-on-one meeting

•      How to keep team members by developing this habit

•      The top questions to ask in a one-on-one

•      The signs that your one-on-one was worth the time
